I found some great gluten-free cookie recipes for you! I've searched the web and found a comprehensive recipe that I've saved to a file called `gluten_free_cookies.md`.

The recipe includes:
- Almond flour chocolate chip cookies
- Oatmeal raisin cookies (using gluten-free oats)
- Peanut butter cookies (naturally gluten-free)

Each recipe includes detailed instructions and tips for getting the perfect texture. Would you like me to show you any specific recipe from the file?
